snippet: The company said in a statement that directors had unanimously chosen Rogelio Zambrano as chairman of the board of directors and Fernando A. Gonzalez as chief.
lead_paragraph: The company said in a statement that directors had unanimously chosen Rogelio Zambrano as chairman of the board of directors and Fernando A. Gonzalez as chief.

headline.main: Cemex of Mexico Names New Chief and Chairman
headline.print_headline: Cemex Of Mexico Names New Chief and Chairman
